We pulsate to the current

Driving through our veins

Which acts as a deterrent

To your aged cultural reins

We pulsate to the current

Driving through our veins

Which acts as a deterrent

To your aged cultural reins

We raise our placards loudly

With bullhorns crystal clear

That crack the glass proudly

Of the ceiling you hold so dear

Electronic Sonnec

We pulsate to the current

Driving through our veins

Which acts as a deterrent

To your aged cultural reins

We raise our placards loudly

With bullhorns crystal clear

That crack the glass proudly

Of the ceiling you hold so dear

We won't stop the marching echoes

No matter where we lay our head

We'll outlast your skin cells final throws

And leave you in the dust dying til' dead

We are the owners of the future

The masters of tomorrow

And we have no remorse

For your present, In

Your final days

We'll have

No

Sorrow
